attributes.action: use his real first name, James, instead of his middle name, Gordon - in the interest of the Prime Minister of the UK being called James Brown
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having discovered this weekend that the Prime Minister's first name is in fact James, and that Gordon is his middle name, we believe that for obvious reasons it would be in the country's best interest for him to reverse this and reinstate the James as his official title.

What other country has a government headed by somebody who shares a name with such a legendarily cool figure as the late Godfather of Soul, the mighty James Brown?

Sign this petition and show the Prime Minister that it is the will of the people!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
